title: Claude Jailbreak results are in, and the hackers won
author: Maximilian Schreiner
description: Anthropic developed a new method to protect AI language models from manipulation attempts. However, within just six days of launching their security challenge, all defensive measures were bypassed.
cntitle: Claude越狱结果已出，黑客获胜
cndescription: Anthropic开发了一种保护AI语言模型免受操纵尝试的新方法。然而，在他们的安全挑战启动仅仅六天后，所有防御措施都被绕过了。
